coded_answer.p: I am writing to you to complain about my unpleasant experience of visiting your theatre on May 21st. I had dreamt about visiting the Circle Theatre to see Danny Brook's performance for a long time. As soon as I saw your advertisement in the 'Tourist Guide' issue 46, I decided to go at once.

However, all my expectations failed to becomecome true. First of all, I found that no discounts foron tickets were available. Although although you mentioned itthem in your advertisement. Next, the show started at 20:15 instead of 19:30. And, finally, right before the startingstart they announced that Danny Brook woudwould not be in the show that evening. So he was replaced by another actor. After the show I was not surpisedsurprised at all to knowlearn that the theatre restaurant was closed for redecoration.

As a whole, I have to say that I got something completely different from what I had expected to get. In connection with that I ask you to refund the money I paid for my tickets. I really hope it will not take you long to settle the matter.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
